links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s-2)*zeta(s-3)/zeta(2*s-4).a(n) = n^2*A001615(n) = n *A000082(n).Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^e*p^(2*e-1)*(p+1). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 16 2001a(n) = sum_{d|n} mu(d)*sigma(n^3/d^2). - _Benoit Cloitre_, Feb 16 2008a(n) = A001615(n^3) = A001615(n^k)/n^(k-3), with k>2. - _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Mar 06 2012
mathematica: a[n_] := n*DivisorSum[n, MoebiusMu[n/#] DivisorSigma[1, #^2]&]; Array[a, 40] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 02 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
